definitions.definition: A single item in a statistical study.
A quantity calculated from the data in a sample , which characterises an important aspect in the sample (such as mean or standard deviation ).
A person, or personal event, reduced to being an item of statistical information.
examples: By dying from an overdose, he became just another statistic .

main_definition: A single item in a statistical study.
secondary_definitions: A quantity calculated from the data in a sample , which characterises an important aspect in the sample (such as mean or standard deviation ).
A person, or personal event, reduced to being an item of statistical information.
